name: MyMobai
tag_list: mobile, mobile-couponing, couponing, iphone, android, affiliate
overview:
We are MyMobai. We do Mobile Couponing.

With our solution MyMobai we are offering advertising companies the opportunity to provide mobile coupons in an open bonus program in order to increase sales and to manage high-frequency periods.

In cooperation with companies running bonus programs we, as a partner and technology provider, implement solutions in order to open up closed bonus programs for the â€œmobile channelâ€.

By using our MyMobai API, companies offering mobile apps and mobile websites will be able to integrate coupons into their own solutions and to implement the entire conversion process. At the same time we will support these companies in turning their mobile apps into money. Therefore, they will become members of MyMobai advertising network.

MyMobai API and MyMobai Skyrocket are thus the complete solution for Mobile Couponing.

Companies operating coupons can easily design them online. To this end, we have developed the Couponing control center MyMobai Skyrocket. Every company can create its very own coupons; it can also determine stores where the coupons can be converted; pictures, texts and coupon codes can be deposited; validity, contingents, target groups can be defined and every specific coupon campaign can be evaluated.

The end users are able to get hold of the MyMobai software on various channels: via the AppStores of their mobile providers and producers, our online platform, mobile websites or via Bluetooth columns. MyMobai is offered for different platforms: J2ME, iPhoneApp, Android, Opera-Widget, 360 â€“Widget. We are supporting more than 700 mobile devices. These are more than 80% of the current mobile market and more than 95% of the mobile devices, which have been released during the past years. We have started early in focusing on mass platforms in order to also appeal to end users who â€œonlyâ€ have a low-budget mobile phone.

We have already created a closed bonus program for the leading real-estate company â€“ Immobilien Scout 24 GmbH. The App as well as the possibilities coming with Mobile Couponing opens up an entirely new business segment and it extends the chain of value.

It is our main objective to deliver the major part of all Mobile Coupons in Europe specifically to the consumer.
